articles.author: Jeff Foust
articles.title: U.K. government won't buy Virgin Orbit - SpaceNews
articles.description: The British government, which helped buy OneWeb out of bankruptcy three years ago, has no plans to do the same with launch company Virgin Orbit.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON The British government, which helped buy OneWeb out of bankruptcy three years ago, has no plans to do the same with launch company Virgin Orbit, a government minister said May 17.
